text: {"fixed_xml":"<ITEM>In dem Brandm\\u221a\\u00ballerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project</TITLE><AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR> klugen und verst\\u221a\\u00a7ndigen Hau\\u221a\\u00fc-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> \\u221a\\u2020 <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda ne\\u221a\\u00ba fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR><TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR><TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantz\\u221a\\u2202sischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>","number_of_corrections":3,"explanation":"1) Removed an erroneous closing </TITLE> that appeared inside the first <BIBL> and moved the descriptive text out of the TITLE element so tags are properly nested. 2) Added a missing <BIBL> wrapper around the entry for Abbt Fleury so each bibliographic item is enclosed consistently. 3) Normalized mixed content layout (kept original text and escape sequences) to ensure all tags are properly opened and closed and nesting is well-formed."}

parsed.fixed_xml: <ITEM>In dem Brandm\u221a\u00ballerischen Buchladen wird ein <BIBL><TITLE>Project</TITLE><AUTHOR>Hiorini</AUTHOR> klugen und verst\u221a\u00a7ndigen Hau\u221a\u00fc-Patter, wie auch avelichem Land-Leben, welches durch Sub. scriptionen in <VOLUME>2. Folianten</VOLUME> \u221a\u2020 <PRIZE>6. fl.</PRIZE> gedrucket wird</BIBL>. Ferner ist allda ne\u221a\u00ba fertig worden: <BIBL><AUTHOR>Lutheri</AUTHOR><TITLE>Bibel</TITLE> mit Figuren in <FORMAT>fol.</FORMAT></BIBL>; Item, des Herrn Abbts <BIBL><AUTHOR>Fleury</AUTHOR><TITLE>Kirchen-Historien</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem frantz\u221a\u2202sischen ubersetzt</BIBL>; Item, <BIBL><TITLE>die gantze Pflicht des Menschen</TITLE><FORMAT>8vo.</FORMAT> aus dem Englischen ubersetzt</BIBL></ITEM>
parsed.explanation: 1) Removed an erroneous closing </TITLE> that appeared inside the first <BIBL> and moved the descriptive text out of the TITLE element so tags are properly nested. 2) Added a missing <BIBL> wrapper around the entry for Abbt Fleury so each bibliographic item is enclosed consistently. 3) Normalized mixed content layout (kept original text and escape sequences) to ensure all tags are properly opened and closed and nesting is well-formed.
